body: 'This being a biotique product i bought it for my newly coloured hair without thinking twice and to my shock it dried up my hair. My brother tried it and he got rash om his scalp. Am really disappointed.with the product.'

title: 'Best one!'
body: 'It is one of the best shampoos I have ever used. It is gentle on hair and keeps it soft. Just oil your hair a 15 mins before washing and use the shampoo to get a good lustre. It really helped me out of my dry split ends. Would highly recommend.'

title: 'Seal is damaged and some of the shampoo and conditioner is spilled out of the bottle'
'dries the hair out and damages them overtime'
'Good shampoo for dry hair.'
body: I've been using this shampoo since last year because i had dry hair. It really worked for me, it made my hair soft after every wash. Make sure to apply oil before every hair wash, it's even more effective in softening your hair and make it shine. In addition to this, it also controlled hairfall in my case. I would definitely recommend this shampoo who has dry and dull hair.

title: 'Excellent shampoo'

title: 'A Super Shampoo'
body: I have been using this shampoo for the last 3 yrs and have been loving it. It's preservative free, made of organic products, makes my hair soft & protects my color. All in one. Love this shampoo!

title: 'Feel fresh'
body: 'Feels fresh. Great fragrance. Long lasting. Worth the money spent.'

title: 'Good'
body: The shampoo doesn't lather up a lot or anything. But it is good for color treated hair and has helped my wife with her damaged her as per her words after using the shampoo.  It doesn't have any strong fragrance of sort. A mild short term fragrance is available when you wash your hair with it.

title: 'A beautiful product for my curls'
body: This has been my favourite shampoo for 5 years now. Works beautifully for my curls and I absolutely love the fragrance. Some people have given poor review, not sure why. I suppose it depends on one'e skin type. I have combination skin and people with curls need more moisture in their shampoo and this shampoo provides that. Oily skin is more prone to dandruff so maybe people with oily skin could avoid this. I hope my review helps that girl or that woman who has been looking for a good curl shampoo high and low, totally worth a try. :)
